content: No, checking type signatures independently from the body is a deliberate restriction for the same reasons as in most other languages, including the GHC warning about missing top-level signatures https://stackoverflow.com/a/19626857/161659
Yuri de Wit has marked this topic as resolved.
For your first variant, we would need "auto inst-implicits", but in contrast to auto implicits it's much less clear what a sensible set of typeclass parameters would be to insert in general
